source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenic shot of a tall, white lighthouse situated in a desolate, rocky desert landscape. In the background, vast, pale mountains stretch into the hazy distance under a clear sky. The camera slowly rises, revealing more of the expansive and arid environment.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenic shot of a tall, white lighthouse situated in a desolate, rocky desert landscape. In the background, vast, pale mountains stretch into the hazy distance under a clear sky. The camera slowly rises, revealing more of the expansive and arid environment.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that a group of people is walking near the base of the lighthouse, which is not visible in the video.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a scenic shot of a tall, white lighthouse situated in a desolate, rocky desert landscape. A group of people can be seen walking near the base of the lighthouse. In the background, vast, pale mountains stretch into the hazy distance under a clear sky. The camera slowly rises, revealing more of the expansive and arid environment.
